H0.text: Who was the husband of Rebekah Brooks from 2002 to 2009. Charlie Brooks

H1.text: Who was the husband of Rebekah Brooks from 2002 to 2009. Chris Evans

H2.text: Who was the husband of Rebekah Brooks from 2002 to 2009. Dominic Mohan

H3.text: Who was the husband of Rebekah Brooks from 2002 to 2009. Ross Kemp

A4.text: Rebekah Brooks married Ross Kemp in 2002 and they divorced in 2009.

A5.text: Rebekah Brooks married former racehorse trainer and author Charlie Brooks after her divorce from Ross Kemp in 2009.
